mapper.insert: insert into board_cafe (num, writer, title, content, viewCount, regdate) values (board_cafe_seq.NEXTVAL, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, #{viewCount}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT result1.* FROM (SELECT num, writer, title, content, viewCount, To_CHAR(regdate,'YY.MM.DD HH24:MI' ) AS regdate LAG(num,1,0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) AS prevNum, LEAD(num,1,0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) AS nextNum FROM board_cafe) result1 WHERE num=#{num}
